item.title: Heather add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Heather add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I haven't the slightest idea how to change people, but still I keep a long list of prospective candidates just in case I should ever figure it out." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Heather add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "I like to have a martini, Two at the very most. After three I'm under the table, after four I'm under my host." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Heather add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "What fresh hell is this?" -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Heather add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "If I didn't care for fun and such, I'd probably amount to much. But I shall stay the way I am, Because I do not give a damn." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Heather add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Time doth flit; oh shit." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Heather add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "By the time you swear you're his, Shivering and sighing. And he vows his passion is, Infinite, undying. Lady make note of this -- One of you is lying." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Heather add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "I might repeat to myself, slowly and soothingly, a list of quotations beautiful from minds profound; if I can remember any of the damn things." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Heather add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "That would be a good thing for them to cut on my tombstone: Wherever she went, including here, it was against her better judgment." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Heather add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut." -- Ernest Hemingway
